title: STEAK DIANE
directions: Cook your steak to your liking with garlic and thyme.
Add the shallots to the frying pan.
Remove the steak and let rest in warm place.
Add the Brandy, you can Flamb√© if you're confident (alcohol will ignite, be very careful) otherwise turn off the heat first.
Add the cream and mix all ingredients.
Turn heat back on full and let sauce reduce.
While it's reducing, chop some parsley.
Sauce is ready when it's thickened a little, you'll see a slight change of colour around the air bubbles.
Add the parsley, and pour over your steak.
